abstracts.cdata!:
The project would continue the efforts
            of the Ministry of Works and Communications (MWC) in
            carrying out its four and a half year road maintenance
            program which is comprised of the following components: (a)
            rehabilitation of part of the paved network; (b)
            continuation and expansion of routine and periodic road
            maintenance programs; (c) strengthening of the organization
            and management of MWC to improve the efficiency of road and
            equipment maintenance; (d) introduction of sound transport
            planning procedures; and (e) assistance to domestic
            contractors to enable their more effective participation in
            road maintenance activities.
